report.name: x_dephasageligneshorsGT1caappli

dataSource.name: Q_REQ
dataSource.select:
(-- Lignes obtenues après comparaison avec les CA préconisés au niveau application [Lignes de type Petit t1, t2, t3, t4, t6, t8 ou t9] (SELECT RPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(si.LIBDSG,1,8),''), 8,' ') DEPARTEMENT_FOURNISSEUR, -- Direction + Département RPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(si.LIBDSG,6,7),''), 7,' ') POLE_FOURNISSEUR, -- Département + Pôle RPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(lb.AIRT),' '),5,' ') CODE_APPLICATION, -- Code Application RPAD(NVL(a.ALIBEL,''), 50,' ') LIB_APPLICATION, -- Libellé Application RPAD(NVL(lb.PID,''), 4,' ') CODE_LIGNE_BIP, -- Code BIP RPAD(NVL(lb.PNOM,''), 30,' ') LIB_LIGNE_BIP, -- Libellé ligne BIP RPAD(NVL(lb.TYPPROJ,''), 2,' ') TYPE_LIGNE, -- Type ligne RPAD(NVL(lb.ARCTYPE,''), 3,' ') TYPOLOGIE, -- Typologie RPAD(NVL(lb.METIER,''), 3,' ') METIER, -- Métier ligne BIP LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(conso.cusag, 'FM999990D0','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'),TO_CHAR(0, 'FM999990D0','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.')),12, ' ') CONSOAA, -- Conso AA LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ROUND(sfb.D_CONSOSG_FI + sfb.D_CONSOSSII_FI)/1000, 'FM999990D0','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'),'0'),12, ' ') COUT12, -- Coût FI déc. N-1 K€ LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ROUND(sfb.CONSOSG_FI + sfb.CONSOSSII_FI - sfb.D_CONSOSG_FI - sfb.D_CONSOSSII_FI)/1000, 'FM999990D0','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0'),12, ' ') COUT, -- Coût FI AAAA K€ LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(NVL(ROUND(sfb.CONSOFTSG_IM + sfb.CONSOFTSSII_IM)/1000, 0.0), 'FM9999999990D0','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,0'),12, ' ') COUT_IMMO, -- Coût immo AAAA K€ RPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(lb.TTRMENS,'mm/yyyy'), ' '), 7, ' ') DATE_TT_MENS, -- Date traitement BIP (Mois et année de la dernière mensuelle) RPAD(NVL(ca.CLIBCA,''), 30,' ') LIB_CAMO, -- Libellé du CAMO LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(lb.CODCAMO),' '),6,'0') CODE_CAMO, -- CA à facturer ' ' TOP_REPARTITION, -- Top Répartition LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO1),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA1, -- CA1 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA1,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA1, -- Libellé CA1 préconisé LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO2),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA2, -- CA2 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA2,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA2, -- Libellé CA2 préconisé LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO3),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA3, -- CA3 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA3,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA3, -- Libellé CA3 préconisé LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO4),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA4, -- CA4 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA4,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA4, -- Libellé CA4 préconisé LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO5),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA5, -- CA5 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA5,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA5, -- Libellé CA5 préconisé LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO6),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA6, -- CA6 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA6,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA6, -- Libellé CA6 préconisé LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO7),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA7, -- CA7 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA7,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA7, -- Libellé CA7 préconisé LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO8),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA8, -- CA8 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA8,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA8, -- Libellé CA8 préconisé LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO9),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA9, -- CA9 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA9,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA9, -- Libellé CA9 préconisé LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO10),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA10, -- CA10 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA10,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA10 -- Libellé CA10 préconisé FROM LIGNE_BIP lb, STRUCT_INFO si, APPLICATION a, CENTRE_ACTIVITE ca, CONSOMME conso, SYNTHESE_FIN_BIP sfb, (SELECT DISTINCT app.AIRT, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO1, NULL, app.CODCAMO1, 0), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO1, NULL, app.CODCAMO1, 0), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO1, NULL, app.CODCAMO1, 0), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO1, NULL, app.CODCAMO1, 0), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO1, NULL, app.CODCAMO1, 0), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO1, NULL, app.CODCAMO1, 0), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO1, NULL, app.CODCAMO1, 0), app.CODCAMO1) CODCAMO1, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA2, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO2, NULL, app.CODCAMO2, 0), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA2, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO2, NULL, app.CODCAMO2, 0), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA2, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO2, NULL, app.CODCAMO2, 0), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA2, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO2, NULL, app.CODCAMO2, 0), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA2, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO2, NULL, app.CODCAMO2, 0), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA2, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO2, NULL, app.CODCAMO2, 0), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA2, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO2, NULL, app.CODCAMO2, 0), app.CODCAMO2) CODCAMO2, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA3, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO3, NULL, app.CODCAMO3, 0), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA3, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO3, NULL, app.CODCAMO3, 0), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA3, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO3, NULL, app.CODCAMO3, 0), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA3, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO3, NULL, app.CODCAMO3, 0), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA3, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO3, NULL, app.CODCAMO3, 0), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA3, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO3, NULL, app.CODCAMO3, 0), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA3, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO3, NULL, app.CODCAMO3, 0), app.CODCAMO3) CODCAMO3, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA4, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO4, NULL, app.CODCAMO4, 0), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA4, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO4, NULL, app.CODCAMO4, 0), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA4, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO4, NULL, app.CODCAMO4, 0), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA4, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO4, NULL, app.CODCAMO4, 0), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA4, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO4, NULL, app.CODCAMO4, 0), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA4, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO4, NULL, app.CODCAMO4, 0), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA4, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO4, NULL, app.CODCAMO4, 0), app.CODCAMO4) CODCAMO4, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA5, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO5, NULL, app.CODCAMO5, 0), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA5, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO5, NULL, app.CODCAMO5, 0), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA5, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO5, NULL, app.CODCAMO5, 0), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA5, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO5, NULL, app.CODCAMO5, 0), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA5, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO5, NULL, app.CODCAMO5, 0), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA5, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO5, NULL, app.CODCAMO5, 0), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA5, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO5, NULL, app.CODCAMO5, 0), app.CODCAMO5) CODCAMO5, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA6, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO6, NULL, app.CODCAMO6, 0), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA6, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO6, NULL, app.CODCAMO6, 0), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA6, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO6, NULL, app.CODCAMO6, 0), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA6, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO6, NULL, app.CODCAMO6, 0), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA6, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO6, NULL, app.CODCAMO6, 0), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA6, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO6, NULL, app.CODCAMO6, 0), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA6, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO6, NULL, app.CODCAMO6, 0), app.CODCAMO6) CODCAMO6, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA7, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO7, NULL, app.CODCAMO7, 0), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA7, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO7, NULL, app.CODCAMO7, 0), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA7, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO7, NULL, app.CODCAMO7, 0), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA7, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO7, NULL, app.CODCAMO7, 0), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA7, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO7, NULL, app.CODCAMO7, 0), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA7, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO7, NULL, app.CODCAMO7, 0), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA7, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO7, NULL, app.CODCAMO7, 0), app.CODCAMO7) CODCAMO7, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA8, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO8, NULL, app.CODCAMO8, 0), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA8, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO8, NULL, app.CODCAMO8, 0), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA8, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO8, NULL, app.CODCAMO8, 0), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA8, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO8, NULL, app.CODCAMO8, 0), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA8, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO8, NULL, app.CODCAMO8, 0), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA8, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO8, NULL, app.CODCAMO8, 0), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA8, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO8, NULL, app.CODCAMO8, 0), app.CODCAMO8) CODCAMO8, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA9, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO9, NULL, app.CODCAMO9, 0), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA9, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO9, NULL, app.CODCAMO9, 0), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA9, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO9, NULL, app.CODCAMO9, 0), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA9, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO9, NULL, app.CODCAMO9, 0), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA9, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO9, NULL, app.CODCAMO9, 0), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA9, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO9, NULL, app.CODCAMO9, 0), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA9, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO9, NULL, app.CODCAMO9, 0), app.CODCAMO9) CODCAMO9, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA10, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO10, NULL, app.CODCAMO10, 0), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA10, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO10, NULL, app.CODCAMO10, 0), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA10, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO10, NULL, app.CODCAMO10, 0), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA10, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO10, NULL, app.CODCAMO10, 0), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA10, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO10, NULL, app.CODCAMO10, 0), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA10, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO10, NULL, app.CODCAMO10, 0), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA10, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO10, NULL, app.CODCAMO10, 0), app.CODCAMO10) CODCAMO10,
DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA1, NULL, app.CLIBCA1, ''), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA1, NULL, app.CLIBCA1, ''), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA1, NULL, app.CLIBCA1, ''), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA1, NULL, app.CLIBCA1, ''), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA1, NULL, app.CLIBCA1, ''), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA1, NULL, app.CLIBCA1, ''), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA1, NULL, app.CLIBCA1, ''), app.CLIBCA1) CLIBCA1, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA2, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA2, NULL, app.CLIBCA2, ''), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA2, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA2, NULL, app.CLIBCA2, ''), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA2, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA2, NULL, app.CLIBCA2, ''), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA2, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA2, NULL, app.CLIBCA2, ''), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA2, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA2, NULL, app.CLIBCA2, ''), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA2, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA2, NULL, app.CLIBCA2, ''), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA2, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA2, NULL, app.CLIBCA2, ''), app.CLIBCA2) CLIBCA2, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA3, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA3, NULL, app.CLIBCA3, ''), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA3, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA3, NULL, app.CLIBCA3, ''), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA3, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA3, NULL, app.CLIBCA3, ''), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA3, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA3, NULL, app.CLIBCA3, ''), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA3, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA3, NULL, app.CLIBCA3, ''), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA3, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA3, NULL, app.CLIBCA3, ''), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA3, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA3, NULL, app.CLIBCA3, ''), app.CLIBCA3) CLIBCA3, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA4, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA4, NULL, app.CLIBCA4, ''), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA4, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA4, NULL, app.CLIBCA4, ''), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA4, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA4, NULL, app.CLIBCA4, ''), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA4, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA4, NULL, app.CLIBCA4, ''), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA4, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA4, NULL, app.CLIBCA4, ''), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA4, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA4, NULL, app.CLIBCA4, ''), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA4, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA4, NULL, app.CLIBCA4, ''), app.CLIBCA4) CLIBCA4, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA5, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA5, NULL, app.CLIBCA5, ''), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA5, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA5, NULL, app.CLIBCA5, ''), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA5, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA5, NULL, app.CLIBCA5, ''), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA5, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA5, NULL, app.CLIBCA5, ''), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA5, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA5, NULL, app.CLIBCA5, ''), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA5, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA5, NULL, app.CLIBCA5, ''), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA5, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA5, NULL, app.CLIBCA5, ''), app.CLIBCA5) CLIBCA5, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA6, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA6, NULL, app.CLIBCA6, ''), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA6, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA6, NULL, app.CLIBCA6, ''), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA6, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA6, NULL, app.CLIBCA6, ''), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA6, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA6, NULL, app.CLIBCA6, ''), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA6, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA6, NULL, app.CLIBCA6, ''), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA6, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA6, NULL, app.CLIBCA6, ''), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA6, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA6, NULL, app.CLIBCA6, ''), app.CLIBCA6) CLIBCA6, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA7, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA7, NULL, app.CLIBCA7, ''), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA7, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA7, NULL, app.CLIBCA7, ''), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA7, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA7, NULL, app.CLIBCA7, ''), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA7, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA7, NULL, app.CLIBCA7, ''), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA7, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA7, NULL, app.CLIBCA7, ''), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA7, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA7, NULL, app.CLIBCA7, ''), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA7, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA7, NULL, app.CLIBCA7, ''), app.CLIBCA7) CLIBCA7, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA8, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA8, NULL, app.CLIBCA8, ''), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA8, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA8, NULL, app.CLIBCA8, ''), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA8, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA8, NULL, app.CLIBCA8, ''), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA8, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA8, NULL, app.CLIBCA8, ''), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA8, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA8, NULL, app.CLIBCA8, ''), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA8, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA8, NULL, app.CLIBCA8, ''), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA8, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA8, NULL, app.CLIBCA8, ''), app.CLIBCA8) CLIBCA8, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA9, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA9, NULL, app.CLIBCA9, ''), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA9, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA9, NULL, app.CLIBCA9, ''), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA9, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA9, NULL, app.CLIBCA9, ''), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA9, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA9, NULL, app.CLIBCA9, ''), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA9, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA9, NULL, app.CLIBCA9, ''), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA9, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA9, NULL, app.CLIBCA9, ''), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA9, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA9, NULL, app.CLIBCA9, ''), app.CLIBCA9) CLIBCA9, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA10, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA10, NULL, app.CLIBCA10, ''), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA10, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA10, NULL, app.CLIBCA10, ''), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA10, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA10, NULL, app.CLIBCA10, ''), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA10, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA10, NULL, app.CLIBCA10, ''), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA10, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA10, NULL, app.CLIBCA10, ''), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA10, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA10, NULL, app.CLIBCA10, ''), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA10, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA10, NULL, app.CLIBCA10, ''), app.CLIBCA10) CLIBCA10 FROM APPLICATION app, LIGNE_BIP lbip WHERE app.AIRT = lbip.AIRT) ca_app, (SELECT lbp.PID, lbp.AIRT, lbp.DPCODE, lbp.ICPI, lbp.CODCAMO FROM LIGNE_BIP lbp WHERE -- Lignes de type Petit t1, t2, t3, t4, t6, t8 ou t9 (((lbp.ARCTYPE != 'T1') AND (lbp.TYPPROJ IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 9))) -- Lignes ouvertes ou fermées dans l'année en cours AND (((TO_CHAR(lbp.PDATDEBPRE, 'yyyy') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy')) OR (TO_CHAR(lbp.PDATFINPRE, 'yyyy') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy')))
-- Lignes fermées au mois de décembre de l'année précédente --PPM 58986 --OR (TO_CHAR(lbp.PDATFINPRE, 'mm/yyyy') = '12/' || TO_CHAR((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy'))-1)))
-- Lignes fermées au mois de janvier de l'année en cours OR (TO_CHAR(lbp.PDATFINPRE, 'mm/yyyy') = '01/' || TO_CHAR((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy'))))) ))) p_lbip WHERE lb.PID = conso.PID(+) AND lb.PID = sfb.PID(+) AND lb.CODSG = si.CODSG AND lb.AIRT = a.AIRT AND lb.CODCAMO = ca.CODCAMO AND lb.AIRT = ca_app.AIRT AND lb.PID = p_lbip.PID AND lb.CODCAMO = p_lbip.CODCAMO -- CAMO n'appartient pas aux CA préconisés au niveau application AND NOT (lb.CODCAMO IN (ca_app.CODCAMO1, ca_app.CODCAMO2, ca_app.CODCAMO3, ca_app.CODCAMO4, ca_app.CODCAMO5, ca_app.CODCAMO6, ca_app.CODCAMO7, ca_app.CODCAMO8, ca_app.CODCAMO9, ca_app.CODCAMO10)))) UNION -- CAS : CODCAMO = 77777 => Comparaison avec ce qui est présent dans la table de répartition (SELECT RPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(si.LIBDSG,1,8),''), 8,' ') DEPARTEMENT_FOURNISSEUR, -- Direction + Département RPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(si.LIBDSG,6,7),''), 7,' ') POLE_FOURNISSEUR, -- Département + Pôle RPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(lb.AIRT),' '),5,' ') CODE_APPLICATION, -- Code Application RPAD(NVL(a.ALIBEL,''), 50,' ') LIB_APPLICATION, -- Libellé Application RPAD(NVL(lb.PID,''), 4,' ') CODE_LIGNE_BIP, -- Code BIP RPAD(NVL(lb.PNOM,''), 30,' ') LIB_LIGNE_BIP, -- Libellé ligne BIP RPAD(NVL(lb.TYPPROJ,''), 2,' ') TYPE_LIGNE, -- Type ligne RPAD(NVL(lb.ARCTYPE,''), 3,' ') TYPOLOGIE, -- Typologie RPAD(NVL(lb.METIER,''), 3,' ') METIER, -- Métier ligne BIP LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(conso.cusag, 'FM999990D0','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'),TO_CHAR(0, 'FM999990D0','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.')),12, ' ') CONSOAA, -- Conso AA LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ROUND(sfb.D_CONSOSG_FI + sfb.D_CONSOSSII_FI)/1000, 'FM999990D0','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'),'0'),12, ' ') COUT12, -- Coût FI déc. N-1 K€ LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ROUND(sfb.CONSOSG_FI + sfb.CONSOSSII_FI - sfb.D_CONSOSG_FI - sfb.D_CONSOSSII_FI)/1000, 'FM999990D0','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0'),12, ' ') COUT, -- Coût FI AAAA K€ LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(NVL(ROUND(sfb.CONSOFTSG_IM + sfb.CONSOFTSSII_IM)/1000, 0.0), 'FM9999999990D0','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,0'),12, ' ') COUT_IMMO, -- Coût immo AAAA K€ RPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(lb.TTRMENS,'mm/yyyy'), ' '), 7, ' ') DATE_TT_MENS, -- Date traitement BIP (Mois et année de la dernière mensuelle) RPAD(NVL(ca.CLIBCA,''), 30,' ') LIB_CAMO, -- Libellé du CAMO LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(lb.CODCAMO),' '),6,'0') CODE_CAMO, -- CA à facturer 'R' TOP_REPARTITION, -- Top Répartition LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO1),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA1, -- CA1 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA1,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA1, -- Libellé CA1 préconisé LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO2),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA2, -- CA2 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA2,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA2, -- Libellé CA2 préconisé LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO3),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA3, -- CA3 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA3,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA3, -- Libellé CA3 préconisé LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO4),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA4, -- CA4 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA4,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA4, -- Libellé CA4 préconisé LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO5),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA5, -- CA5 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA5,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA5, -- Libellé CA5 préconisé LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO6),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA6, -- CA6 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA6,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA6, -- Libellé CA6 préconisé LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO7),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA7, -- CA7 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA7,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA7, -- Libellé CA7 préconisé LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO8),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA8, -- CA8 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA8,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA8, -- Libellé CA8 préconisé LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO9),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA9, -- CA9 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA9,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA9, -- Libellé CA9 préconisé LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(ca_app.CODCAMO10),' '),6,'0') CODE_CA10, -- CA10 préconisé RPAD(NVL(ca_app.CLIBCA10,''), 30,' ') LIB_CA10 -- Libellé CA10 préconisé FROM LIGNE_BIP lb, STRUCT_INFO si, APPLICATION a, CENTRE_ACTIVITE ca, CONSOMME conso, SYNTHESE_FIN_BIP sfb, (SELECT DISTINCT app.AIRT, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO1, NULL, app.CODCAMO1, 0), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO1, NULL, app.CODCAMO1, 0), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO1, NULL, app.CODCAMO1, 0), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO1, NULL, app.CODCAMO1, 0), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO1, NULL, app.CODCAMO1, 0), 8, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO1, NULL, app.CODCAMO1, 0), 9, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'EXP', app.CODCAMO1, NULL, app.CODCAMO1, 0), app.CODCAMO1) CODCAMO1, DECODE(lbip.TYPPROJ, 1, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA2, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO2, NULL, app.CODCAMO2, 0), 2, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA2, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO2, NULL, app.CODCAMO2, 0), 3, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA2, 'MAINT', app.CODCAMO2, NULL, app.CODCAMO2, 0), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA2, app.CLIBCA1, NULL, app.CLIBCA1, ''), 4, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'MAINT', app.CLIBCA1, NULL, app.CLIBCA1, ''), 6, DECODE(app.TYPACTCA1, 'EXP', app.CLIBCA1, NULL, app.CLIBCA1, ''), 8, lbip.AIRT) ca_app, (SELECT lbp.PID, lbp.AIRT, lbp.DPCODE, lbp.ICPI, lbp.CODCAMO FROM LIGNE_BIP lbp WHERE -- Lignes de type Petit t1, t2, t3, t4, t6, t8 ou t9 (((lbp.ARCTYPE != 'T1') AND (lbp.TYPPROJ IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 9))) -- Lignes ouvertes ou fermées dans l'année en cours AND (((TO_CHAR(lbp.PDATDEBPRE, 'yyyy') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy')) OR (TO_CHAR(lbp.PDATFINPRE, 'yyyy') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy'))) -- Lignes fermées au mois de janvier de l'année courante --SEL PPM 58986 OR (TO_CHAR(lbp.PDATFINPRE, 'mm/yyyy') = '12/' || TO_CHAR((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy'))-1)))))) p_lbip, OR (TO_CHAR(lbp.PDATFINPRE, 'mm/yyyy') = '01/' || TO_CHAR((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy')))))))) p_lbip, (SELECT rl.PID, rl.CODCAMO FROM REPARTITION_LIGNE rl WHERE -- Lignes saisies au cours dans l'année en cours ((TO_CHAR(rl.DATDEB, 'yyyy') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy')) OR (TO_CHAR(rl.DATFIN, 'yyyy') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy'))) --SEL PPM 58986 OR ((TO_CHAR(rl.DATDEB, 'mm/yyyy') = '01/' || TO_CHAR((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy'))))) OR (TO_CHAR(rl.DATFIN, 'mm/yyyy') = '01/' || TO_CHAR((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy'))))))) rep_lbip WHERE lb.PID = conso.PID(+) AND lb.PID = sfb.PID(+) AND lb.CODSG = si.CODSG AND lb.AIRT = a.AIRT AND lb.CODCAMO = ca.CODCAMO AND lb.AIRT = ca_app.AIRT AND lb.PID = p_lbip.PID AND lb.CODCAMO = p_lbip.CODCAMO -- CAMO n'appartient pas aux CA préconisés au niveau application AND NOT (rep_lbip.CODCAMO IN (ca_app.CODCAMO1, ca_app.CODCAMO2, ca_app.CODCAMO3, ca_app.CODCAMO4, ca_app.CODCAMO5, ca_app.CODCAMO6, ca_app.CODCAMO7, ca_app.CODCAMO8, ca_app.CODCAMO9, ca_app.CODCAMO10)) AND lb.PID = rep_lbip.PID AND lb.CODCAMO = 77777) ;

dataDescriptor.expression: LPAD ( NVL ( TO_CHAR ( ROUND ( sfb.D_CONSOSG_FI + sfb.D_CONSOSSII_FI ) / 1000 , 'FM999990D0' , 'NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.' ) , '0' ) , 12 , ' ' )
LPAD ( NVL ( TO_CHAR ( ROUND ( sfb.CONSOSG_FI + sfb.CONSOSSII_FI - sfb.D_CONSOSG_FI - sfb.D_CONSOSSII_FI ) / 1000 , 'FM999990D0' , 'NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.' ) , '0' ) , 12 , ' ' )
LPAD ( NVL ( TO_CHAR ( NVL ( ROUND ( sfb.CONSOFTSG_IM + sfb.CONSOFTSSII_IM ) / 1000 , 0.0 ) , 'FM9999999990D0' , 'NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.' ) , '0,0' ) , 12 , ' ' )
